name: Fiikle
description:
Submitted to the GMTK 2019 Game Jam.
Theme: Only One

In Fiikle, you have only one weapon to throw at enemies, and have to retrieve it before you can throw it again.

Run through levels as Fiikle, slaying demons, grabbing orbs to progress through levels, and confront a final deadly sorcerer.

Controls:
WASD: Move
Space: Dash/Dodge
Left Click: Throw Weapon
Right Click: Retrieve Weapon
